document.full_text: the new york mets won a rain-shortened game with the chicago cubs 7-4 on wednesday to bring a positive result to their otherwise less than encouraging week.
document.title: mets get out of funk with rain-shortened win
lines_and_colors: the new york mets won a rain-shortened game with the chicago cubs 7-4 on wednesday to bring a positive result to their otherwise less than encouraging week.
